API Collection# RangeReplaceableCollection Implementations

## [Topics](/documentation/Swift/ContiguousArray/RangeReplaceableCollection-Implementations#topics)

### [Operators](/documentation/Swift/ContiguousArray/RangeReplaceableCollection-Implementations#Operators)

[`static func + <Other>(Self, Other) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/contiguousarray/+(_:_:)-1rz1t)Creates a new collection by concatenating the elements of a collection and a sequence.[`static func + <Other>(Other, Self) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/contiguousarray/+(_:_:)-3ntif)Creates a new collection by concatenating the elements of a sequence and a collection.[`static func + <Other>(Self, Other) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/contiguousarray/+(_:_:)-5igl)Creates a new collection by concatenating the elements of two collections.[`static func += <Other>(inout Self, Other)`](/documentation/swift/contiguousarray/+=(_:_:))Appends the elements of a sequence to a range-replaceable collection.### [Initializers](/documentation/Swift/ContiguousArray/RangeReplaceableCollection-Implementations#Initializers)

[`init()`](/documentation/swift/contiguousarray/init())Creates a new, empty array.[`init<S>(S)`](/documentation/swift/contiguousarray/init(_:)-19zub)Creates a new instance of a collection containing the elements of a sequence.[`init(repeating: Element, count: Int)`](/documentation/swift/contiguousarray/init(repeating:count:))Creates a new array containing the specified number of a single, repeated value.[`init(repeating: Self.Element, count: Int)`](/documentation/swift/contiguousarray/init(repeating:count:)-47x84)Creates a new collection containing the specified number of a single, repeated value.### [Instance Methods](/documentation/Swift/ContiguousArray/RangeReplaceableCollection-Implementations#Instance-Methods)

[`func append(Element)`](/documentation/swift/contiguousarray/append(_:))Adds a new element at the end of the array.[`func append(Self.Element)`](/documentation/swift/contiguousarray/append(_:)-4na3g)Adds an element to the end of the collection.[`func append<S>(contentsOf: S)`](/documentation/swift/contiguousarray/append(contentsof:))Adds the elements of a sequence to the end of the array.[`func append<S>(contentsOf: S)`](/documentation/swift/contiguousarray/append(contentsof:)-66qjk)Adds the elements of a sequence or collection to the end of this collection.[`func applying(CollectionDifference<Self.Element>) -> Self?`](/documentation/swift/contiguousarray/applying(_:))Applies the given difference to this collection.[`func insert(Self.Element, at: Self.Index)`](/documentation/swift/contiguousarray/insert(_:at:)-81ye7)Inserts a new element into the collection at the specified position.[`func insert<C>(contentsOf: C, at: Self.Index)`](/documentation/swift/contiguousarray/insert(contentsof:at:))Inserts the elements of a sequence into the collection at the specified position.[`func popLast() -> Self.Element?`](/documentation/swift/contiguousarray/poplast())Removes and returns the last element of the collection.[`func remove(at: Self.Index) -> Self.Element`](/documentation/swift/contiguousarray/remove(at:)-6yx8z)Removes and returns the element at the specified position.[`func removeAll(keepingCapacity: Bool)`](/documentation/swift/contiguousarray/removeall(keepingcapacity:))Removes all elements from the array.[`func removeAll(keepingCapacity: Bool)`](/documentation/swift/contiguousarray/removeall(keepingcapacity:)-2onkd)Removes all elements from the collection.[`func removeAll(where: (Self.Element) throws -> Bool) rethrows`](/documentation/swift/contiguousarray/removeall(where:)-3or72)Removes all the elements that satisfy the given predicate.[`func removeAll(where: (Self.Element) throws -> Bool) rethrows`](/documentation/swift/contiguousarray/removeall(where:)-44y75)Removes all the elements that satisfy the given predicate.[`func removeFirst() -> Self.Element`](/documentation/swift/contiguousarray/removefirst())Removes and returns the first element of the collection.[`func removeFirst(Int)`](/documentation/swift/contiguousarray/removefirst(_:))Removes the specified number of elements from the beginning of the collection.[`func removeLast() -> Self.Element`](/documentation/swift/contiguousarray/removelast())Removes and returns the last element of the collection.[`func removeLast(Int)`](/documentation/swift/contiguousarray/removelast(_:))Removes the specified number of elements from the end of the collection.[`func removeSubrange(Range<Self.Index>)`](/documentation/swift/contiguousarray/removesubrange(_:)-3k98x)Removes the elements in the specified subrange from the collection.[`func removeSubrange<R>(R)`](/documentation/swift/contiguousarray/removesubrange(_:)-8cd5m)Removes the elements in the specified subrange from the collection.[`func
